description: The Hayabusa is the most commonly-observed fighter within the confines of the Republic of Cantera. Initially a small mining survey ship, the Hayabusa was retrofitted to a combat role to defend against the Reivers. The Hayabusa has good acceleration for a ship its size, while its manoeuvrability is only average. Its weapon systems are at best described as weak. Just like the Daito, the Hayabusa is a good choice for day-to-day patrolling duties but is only second-best when it comes to combat.
name: Hayabusa
